XRLightEstimateSphericalHarmonicsCoeffic.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only sphericalHarmonicsCoefficients property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} containing 9 spherical harmonics coefficients.

remarks.para: Spherical harmonic lighting is a technique that uses spherical functions instead of standard lighting equations. See Wikipedia for more information.

XRLightEstimateSphericalHarmonicsCoeffic.value: A containing 9 spherical harmonics coefficients. The array contains 27 elements in total, with every 3 elements defining red, green, and blue components for each coefficient.The first 3 elements must be a valid lighting estimate component; the rest may be 0 due to privacy settings or limitations of the device to provide more data.
